languages.text: {n}Мгновение безмолвной дуэли с ласераксом, кажется, тянется вечность. Наконец, затравленно ощерившись, зверь бросается прочь, не тронув сво{mf|его|ю} избавител{mf|я|ьницу} даже когтем.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Мгновение безмолвной дуэли с ласераксом, кажется, тянется вечность. Наконец, затравленно ощерившись, зверь бросается прочь, не тронув сво{mf|его|ю} избавител{mf|я|ьницу} даже когтем.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The silent duel with the lacerax lasts only a moment but feels like an eternity. Finally, with a beleaguered snarl, the beast dashes away without laying even a claw on its liberator.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мгновение безмолвной дуэли с ласераксом, кажется, тянется вечность. Наконец, затравленно ощерившись, зверь бросается прочь, не тронув сво{mf|его|ю} избавител{mf|я|ьницу} даже когтем.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The silent duel with the lacerax lasts a moment that feels like an eternity. Finally, with a beleaguered snarl, the beast dashes away, its claws never even slightly touching its liberator.{/n}
{n}The silent duel with the lacerax lasts a moment that feels like an eternity. Finally, with a beleaguered snarl, the beast dashes away, its claws never even slightly touching its liberator.{/n}
{n}The silent duel with the lacerax lasts only a moment but feels like an eternity. Finally, with a beleaguered snarl, the beast dashes away without laying even a claw on its liberator.{/n}
{n}The silent duel with the lacerax lasts only a moment but feels like an eternity. Finally, with a beleaguered snarl, the beast dashes away without laying even a claw on its liberator.{/n}
{n}The silent duel with the lacerax lasts only a moment but feels like an eternity. Finally, with a beleaguered snarl, the beast dashes away without laying even a claw on its liberator.{/n}
{n}The silent duel with the lacerax lasts only a moment but feels like an eternity. Finally, with a beleaguered snarl, the beast dashes away without laying even a claw on its liberator.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das lautlose Duell mit dem Lacerax dauert nur einen Moment, fühlt sich aber an wie eine Ewigkeit. Schließlich läuft die angeschlagene Kreatur mit einem Knurren davon, ohne ihrer Befreierin auch nur ein Haar zu krümmen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The silent duel with the lacerax lasts only a moment but feels like an eternity. Finally, with a beleaguered snarl, the beast dashes away without laying even a claw on its liberator.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das lautlose Duell mit dem Lacerax dauert nur einen Moment, fühlt sich aber an wie eine Ewigkeit. Schließlich läuft die angeschlagene Kreatur mit einem Knurren davon, ohne ihrer Befreierin auch nur ein Haar zu krümmen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le duel silencieux contre le lacérax ne dure que quelques instants qui vous semblent pourtant interminables. Enfin, la bête pousse un grondement tourmenté et s'enfuit, sans même essayer d'attaquer {mf|son libérateur|sa libératrice}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The silent duel with the lacerax lasts only a moment but feels like an eternity. Finally, with a beleaguered snarl, the beast dashes away without laying even a claw on its liberator.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le duel silencieux contre le lacérax ne dure que quelques instants qui vous semblent pourtant interminables. Enfin, la bête pousse un grondement tourmenté et s'enfuit, sans même essayer d'attaquer {mf|son libérateur|sa libératrice}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}尽管你与异虎无声的对峙仅仅持续了片刻，但感觉仿佛永无止境。到最后，异虎发出一声恼火的咆哮，窜了出去，碰都没碰它的救命恩人。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The silent duel with the lacerax lasts only a moment but feels like an eternity. Finally, with a beleaguered snarl, the beast dashes away without laying even a claw on its liberator.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}尽管你与异虎无声的对峙仅仅持续了片刻，但感觉仿佛永无止境。到最后，异虎发出一声恼火的咆哮，窜了出去，碰都没碰它的救命恩人。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El duelo silencioso con el lacerax solo dura unos instantes, pero parece alargarse una eternidad. Finalmente, con un gruñido atribulado, la bestia huye sin que su liberador{mf||a} sufra un solo rasguño.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The silent duel with the lacerax lasts only a moment but feels like an eternity. Finally, with a beleaguered snarl, the beast dashes away without laying even a claw on its liberator.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El duelo silencioso con el lacerax solo dura unos instantes, pero parece alargarse una eternidad. Finalmente, con un gruñido atribulado, la bestia huye sin que su liberador{mf||a} sufra un solo rasguño.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ラセラックスとの静かな決闘はほんの一瞬の間の出来事だったが、まるで永遠に続くかのように感じられた。その獣はついに、疲れ切った唸り声をあげて、解放者に爪一つ触れずに走り去っていった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The silent duel with the lacerax lasts only a moment but feels like an eternity. Finally, with a beleaguered snarl, the beast dashes away without laying even a claw on its liberator.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ラセラックスとの静かな決闘はほんの一瞬の間の出来事だったが、まるで永遠に続くかのように感じられた。その獣はついに、疲れ切った唸り声をあげて、解放者に爪一つ触れずに走り去っていった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Laseraks ile olan sessiz düello, yalnızca bir an sürmesine rağmen sonsuzluk gibi geliyor. En nihayetinde yaratık, bitkin bir hırıltı eşliğinde kutarıcısına tek bir pençe dahi atmadan kaçıp gidiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The silent duel with the lacerax lasts only a moment but feels like an eternity. Finally, with a beleaguered snarl, the beast dashes away without laying even a claw on its liberator.{/n}
